title: Ravengard's Scourger
content:
Ravengard's Scourger Rare 3~10 Damage 1d8+2Piercing Weapon Enchantment +2 Commander's Strike Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Duke Ravengard's father was the sort of man who works with his hands, and communicates in grunts. In his heart his son vowed to do better. But when Wyll was born, Ravengard felt a strange gravity that drew him away from his son. Morningstar 1.8 310

Ravengard's Scourger

Weapon
